summary: This is a brief email chain from July 23, 2019, referencing a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein moving money overseas, flagged by Deutsche Bank. The email indicates a team was already working on the matter and mentions an interview with someone named McFadden.

persons.name: McFadden
persons.context: Mentioned as having discussed the matter in an interview; likely a person involved in the investigation or reporting on the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the referenced New York Times article concerning overseas money transfers flagged by Deutsche Bank.

events.title: NYT Article on Epstein's Flagged Bank Transactions
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article detailing how Jeffrey Epstein moved money overseas in transactions that Deutsche Bank flagged to U.S. authorities.

keyFacts: A New York Times article on July 23, 2019, reported that Jeffrey Epstein's overseas money transfers were flagged by Deutsche Bank to U.S. authorities.
An email indicates a team was 'already on it' regarding the information in the article.
A person named McFadden had discussed the matter in an interview prior to this email.
